name: TurtoBan - 3D Sokoban
description:
A 3D Sokoban game, with a cute turtle

This is a 3D version of classic game, sokoban.

The objective of this game is to move all turtle shells into water storage.

Game features:

-3D/2D perspective

-2 boxes, 3 boxes and 4 boxes

-More than 600 puzzles

-Cute turtle character

-Zoom by pinch -Undo moves

-Clear puzzles to earn Gems

-Gems can be used to get solutions
